Name: Avenue
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
1.25 ml Orange blossom water / Orange flower water
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Passion fruit and orange flavours, laced with apple brandy and bourbon. Fruity yet dry.
History: First published in William J. "Billy" Tarling's 1937 Café Royal Bar Book where he credits its creation to "W. G. Crompton."
